notes: Energy Burst's damage is delayed by 0.03 seconds, so it can be avoided by turning spell immune, invulnerable or hidden after cast.
Instantly kills illusions, regardless of any status effects, except for Shallow Grave.
abilities.name: Energy Burst
abilities.description: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.

description: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
